languages.text: {n}Стоит вам опустить оба обломка на поверхность алтаря, как неодолимая сила притягивает ваши ладони к частям клинка. Из-под ладоней брызжет кровь, покрывающая переливающийся металл — и оба обломка начинают таять, словно снег на солнечном свету, растворяясь в алых разводах. Несколько мучительных мгновений агонии — и кровь, повинуясь незримой силе, обращает свой ток, вливаясь обратно в ваши жилы через рваные раны.{/n}

{n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам опустить оба обломка на поверхность алтаря, как неодолимая сила притягивает ваши ладони к частям клинка. Из-под ладоней брызжет кровь, покрывающая переливающийся металл — и оба обломка начинают таять, словно снег на солнечном свету, растворяясь в алых разводах. Несколько мучительных мгновений агонии — и кровь, повинуясь незримой силе, обращает свой ток, вливаясь обратно в ваши жилы через рваные раны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Just as you put both of the shards on the surface of the altar, an irresistible force attracts your palms to the pieces of the blade. Blood starts bursting from under your palms and covering the iridescent metal, then both shards begin melting like snow in the sunlight, dissolving in the crimson fluid. After several moments of tormenting agony blood, following an invisible force, reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through grievous wounds.{/n}

{n}Just as you put both of the shards on the surface of the altar, an irresistible force attracts your palms to the pieces of the blade. Blood starts bursting from under your palms and covering the iridescent metal, then both shards begin melting like snow in the sunlight, dissolving in the crimson fluid. After several moments of tormenting agony blood, following an invisible force, reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through grievous wounds.{/n}

{n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms, covering the iridescent metal, then both shards begin dissolving in the crimson fluid, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several moments of tormenting agony, the blood magically reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through grievous wounds.{/n}

{n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms, covering the iridescent metal, then both shards begin dissolving in the crimson fluid, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several moments of tormenting agony, the blood magically reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through grievous wounds.{/n}

{n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你刚刚把两块碎片放在祭坛上时，某种不可抗拒的力量便将你的双手拉向它们。鲜血从你的手掌中喷涌而出，覆在五彩斑斓的金属之上……随后，两块碎片在深红色的液体中溶解，像雪花一样在阳光下融化。片刻的痛苦煎熬之后，流出来的鲜血奇迹般地反向流动，通过血肉模糊的伤口，重新涌入你的血管。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你刚刚把两块碎片放在祭坛上时，某种不可抗拒的力量便将你的双手拉向它们。鲜血从你的手掌中喷涌而出，覆在五彩斑斓的金属之上……随后，两块碎片在深红色的液体中溶解，像雪花一样在阳光下融化。片刻的痛苦煎熬之后，流出来的鲜血奇迹般地反向流动，通过血肉模糊的伤口，重新涌入你的血管。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès l'instant où vous placez les deux fragments sur l'autel, vous sentez une force irrésistible qui attire vos mains vers eux. Du sang jaillit de vos paumes, aspergeant le métal iridescent. Et soudain, les deux éclats semblent fondre comme neige au soleil. Après un long moment de douleur insoutenable, l'écoulement de votre sang s'inverse comme par magie et il retourne dans vos veines à travers les plaies béantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès l'instant où vous placez les deux fragments sur l'autel, vous sentez une force irrésistible qui attire vos mains vers eux. Du sang jaillit de vos paumes, aspergeant le métal iridescent. Et soudain, les deux éclats semblent fondre comme neige au soleil. Après un long moment de douleur insoutenable, l'écoulement de votre sang s'inverse comme par magie et il retourne dans vos veines à travers les plaies béantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}剣の破片を祭壇に置くと同時に、抗いがたい力が手を引き寄せた。手の平から飛び出した血がイリディセントの金属を覆い、ふたつの破片は日にさらされた雪のように溶けて、深紅の液体と化した。拷問のような苦痛がしばらく続いた後、血は魔法のように逆流し、痛々しい傷痕から血管の中に戻っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}剣の破片を祭壇に置くと同時に、抗いがたい力が手を引き寄せた。手の平から飛び出した血がイリディセントの金属を覆い、ふたつの破片は日にさらされた雪のように溶けて、深紅の液体と化した。拷問のような苦痛がしばらく続いた後、血は魔法のように逆流し、痛々しい傷痕から血管の中に戻っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto colocas ambos fragmentos sobre el altar, una fuerza irresistible atrae tus manos hacia ellos. La sangre brota de tus palmas, salpicando el metal iridiscente... y de pronto ambos fragmentos se empiezan a disolver como la nieve en la luz del sol. Tras varios momentos de agonía pura, la sangre, de forma inexplicable, invierte su curso y vuelve a tus venas a través de las heridas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto colocas ambos fragmentos sobre el altar, una fuerza irresistible atrae tus manos hacia ellos. La sangre brota de tus palmas, salpicando el metal iridiscente... y de pronto ambos fragmentos se empiezan a disolver como la nieve en la luz del sol. Tras varios momentos de agonía pura, la sangre, de forma inexplicable, invierte su curso y vuelve a tus venas a través de las heridas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gerade, als du beide Splitter auf den Altar legst, zieht eine unwiderstehliche Macht deine Hände zu ihnen. Blut schießt aus deinen Handflächen und bedeckt das glänzende Metall. Dann beginnen beide Splitter, sich in der roten Flüssigkeit aufzulösen. Sie schmelzen wie Schnee in der Sonne. Nach mehreren Augenblicken der qualvollen Schmerzen kehrt das Blut seinen Fluss auf magische Weise um und strömt durch schwere Wunden zurück in deine Adern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms, covering the iridescent metal, then both shards begin dissolving in the crimson fluid, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several moments of tormenting agony, the blood magically reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through grievous wounds.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her iki parçayı da sunağın üzerine koyduğunda anda karşı konulamaz bir güç, ellerini onlara doğru çekiyor. Avuçlarından fışkıran kan, rengârenk metale bulaşıyor. Sonrasında parçalar çözülüyor, güneşi görmüş kar misali eriyorlar. Acı dolu saniyelerin ardından kan, açıklanamaz bir şekilde tersine akmaya başlıyor ve kesiklerden geçip damarlarına dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just as you place both of the shards on the altar, an irresistible force pulls your hands toward them. Blood bursts forth from your palms onto the iridescent metal... and then the shards begin to dissolve, melting like snow in the sunlight. After several agonising moments, the blood inexplicably reverses its flow and pours back into your veins through the jagged wounds.{/n}
